programme.title: Pamilya Talk With Tita Jing S5
programme.desc: Jing Castaneda dishes out advice regarding matters close to the heart.

programme.title: Astig Vegan
programme.desc: Find out how to prepare some of the best vegan Filipino dishes on this show.

programme.title: Juan Big Bite
programme.desc: Follow the culinary adventures, mouthwatering recipes and explorations of diverse cuisines across the Philippines with host Miguel.

programme.title: Home Away From Home S4
programme.desc: This lifestyle programme celebrates Filipino stories abroad as it chronicles Filipino communities all over the world and explores cultural exchanges of Filipinos in their home away from home.

programme.title: Juan Conversations with Rose Eclarinal S2
programme.desc: Global achievers and everyday heroes reveal the triumphs, struggles and inspiring journeys of overseas Filipinos across Europe.

programme.title: TV Patrol Sabado Live
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: Rainbow Rumble (Sat)
programme.desc: Hosted by Luis Manzano, Rainbow Rumble is a trivia game show where five players race to reach the peak of a colour pyramid in a bid to advance to the jackpot round with one million pesos at stake!

programme.title: Your Face Sounds Familiar (Sat)
programme.desc: Family members face-to-face, sound-to-face! Now hosted by Vhong Navarro and Jhong Hilario, the reality show that transformed the weekend viewing of Filipinos is back!

programme.title: Love In 40 Days
programme.desc: Jane gets into a car accident and ends up in Evergreen Mansion, a transitory place in the afterlife. She has to stay there for 40 days while waiting for a potential crossover to heaven. But Evergreen Mansion is in danger of being demolished because of businessman Edward's plans.

programme.title: Maalalaala Mo Kaya
programme.desc: Maalaala Mo Kaya (MMK) is dubbed the longest-running drama anthology on Philippine television with Charo Santos-Concio narrating real-life stories of ordinary people in this award-winning masterpiece.

programme.title: The Third Party
programme.desc: A modern love triangle forms when Andi reunites with her ex-boyfriend Max and meets his current partner. Their relationship turns more complicated when they find themselves in a situation where they have to keep an eye on each other.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Ano Na, Bev S5
programme.desc: Enjoy the best expressed views with award-winning journalist Bev Llorente.

programme.title: Citizen Pinoy
programme.desc: This US-produced talk show discusses frequently-asked questions about US migration. It provides the stage for engaging talk that highlights topics relevant to our kababayans in the US and the Philippines.

programme.title: Kapamilya Journeys of Hope with Fr. Tito Caluag
programme.desc: Kapamilya Journeys of Hope with Fr. Tito Caluag reflects on hope and the journey in finding and fulfilling the mission of God for them.

programme.title: The Healing Eucharist
programme.desc: A celebration of the Liturgy of the Lord.

programme.title: Bro. Eddie Classics
programme.desc: See Brother Eddie Villanueva's most memorable preachings.

programme.title: Astig Vegan
programme.desc: Find out how to prepare some of the best vegan Filipino dishes on this show.

programme.title: My Puhunan: Kaya Mo!
programme.desc: Join award-winning ABS-CBN journalist Karen Davila, together with her co-host Migs Bustos, as they showcase inspiring success stories that aim to motivate viewers to reach their dreams!

programme.title: Beached S4
programme.desc: Beached takes viewers on the ultimate tropical adventure that will allow them to discover new shores and the exclusive accommodations and activites that come with them.

programme.title: Darna
programme.desc: Narda, an emergency medical technician and a loving breadwinner to the Custodio family, is destined to become the next protector of the powerful stone that enables her to transform into a superhero who has special abilities to help those in danger.

programme.title: Tabing Ilog
programme.desc: Eight teenagers struggle to find themselves and their true purpose. All things build them up to form friendship and love which will transform them for the rest of their lives.

programme.title: Lavender Fields
programme.desc: The life of a simple flower farm girl is shattered when she falls for a charming accountant, who turns out to be a married gun cartel member. Targeted for his stolen money, she loses everything she holds dear and reinvents herself to seek justice.

programme.title: Pamilya Sagrado
programme.desc: Being a prominent political clan, the Sagrados want nothing but to keep their name faultless and sacred, until a controversial incident comes their way.

programme.title: Ngayon At Kailanman
programme.desc: Eva fights to reclaim her place in the wealthy Cortes family while searching for the truth about her identity. Fate brings her together with Inno, and their love story endures family secrets, rivalry and tragedy as they discover the real meaning of forgiveness and redemption.

programme.title: BRGY S4
programme.desc: BRGY features interesting and humorous stories about Filipinos and businesses in North America.

programme.title: TFC Kids Zone
programme.desc: A programme block filled with animated short stories, nursery rhymes and songs, as well as Filipino language lessons, TFC Kids' Zone promises a rich treasure trove of learning and discovery that parents and their young ones will find enriching and empowering.

programme.desc: A daily celebration of the Liturgy of the Lord.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 13
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Pik Pak Boom
programme.desc: Pik Pak Boom is a 1988 Filipino anthology comedy film directed by Leroy Salvador and starring Herbert Bautista, Lea Salonga, Lilet, Bing Loyzaga, Regine Velasquez, and Dingdong Avanzado. The film consists of two segments: \"Manyika\" (lit. 'Doll') and \"Banana Q\".

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 13
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Afterlife ep 3
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 11
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Bea Montenegro ep 6
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. Hot off the heels from her last cold case, investigative journalist Christine Del Mundo (Maui Taylor) is back with a brand new cold case. This time, it involves actress Bea Montenegro, whose death has only brought forth one suspect - a fellow model who suffers from face blindness.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 2
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 13
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: For the Love ep 13
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 11
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Pik Pak Boom
programme.desc: Pik Pak Boom is a 1988 Filipino anthology comedy film directed by Leroy Salvador and starring Herbert Bautista, Lea Salonga, Lilet, Bing Loyzaga, Regine Velasquez, and Dingdong Avanzado. The film consists of two segments: \"Manyika\" (lit. 'Doll') and \"Banana Q\".

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 17
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Bernardo Carpio ep 6
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 159
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Kapag Wala Nang Batas
programme.desc: Gabriel (Chuck Perez) decides to enter the seminary to escape the violent world his family is involved with. But he soon realizes that he cannot totally breakout from his legacy.

programme.title: Ang Agimat Ni Pepe
programme.desc: Pepe, the naughty ward of parish priest Padre Lusano always gets in trouble with Chino, the young farmer who owns the chickens that Pepe loves to shoot at.

programme.title: Ipagpatawad Mo
programme.desc: They were the ideal couple and seemed to lead the perfect life. But their son was not like the other normal children. How they came to terms with the presence of their autistic child in their lives, is the gist of this wonderfully crafted film.

programme.title: Nandito Ako
programme.desc: He is a lieutenant in the NBI. She is a manager of a stuff toys company. Sparks have flown when it became the lieutenant's job to bring the manager safely to Manila to become a witness. They argued, they fought and then they fell in love.

programme.title: Tumayo Ka't Lumaban
programme.desc: Crisanto (Ronnie Ricketts) is a man with a mission. Circumstances have forced him and his sister to be raised by separate foster families. But now, Crisanto is determined to find his sister.

programme.title: Una Kang Naging Akin
programme.desc: Is there any way for Gabby to regain his other \"memory\" and remember the family he left behind?

programme.title: SPO4 Santiago (Sharpshooter)
programme.desc: Bong Revilla, Jr, starred in this exciting film based on the real-life exploits of SPO4 Jimmy Santiago, SWAT member and sharp-shooter, who was idolized by the masses because he relentlessly went after hostage takers, hold-uppers and all sorts of criminals.

programme.title: Judge Max Asuncion, Hukom Bitay
programme.desc: Based on the real-life adventures of Judge Max Asuncion who was known as a stickler for the law and as a man who got death threats for breakfast.
